duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage a horizontal team of talented and dedicated ML and backend engineers to build the foundational user understanding features to be used across all Pinterest ecosystems.
Utilize state of the art algorithms/industry best practice to build and improve user understanding signals.
Partner with other engineering teams and sales & marketing team to discover future opportunities to improve content recommendation on Pinterest.
Hire new engineers to expand the team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (Master's preferred)
